doc.str: A system and method were used to treat produced water. Field-testing demonstrated the removal of contaminants from produced water from oil and gas wells.

International Search Report for PCT/US08/80262, International Searching Authority, May 5, 2009, pp. 1-9. cited by other. | Sullivan et al., "Water Treatment Technology for Oil and Gas Produced Water," 2004, pp. 216-225. cited by other . | In-Soung Chang et al.; 2002; "Air sparging of a submerged MBR for municipal wastewater treatment"; Process Biochemistry 37 (2002) 915-920. cited by examiner . | Brookes, et al., "Fouling of Membrane Bioreactors During Treatment of Produced Water," Proceedings of International Membrane Science and Technology Conference; Sydney, Australia, 2003, pp. 1-7. cited by other .
SULLIVAN, ENID, J. | KATZ, LYNN | KINNEY, KERRY | BOWMAN, ROBERT, S. | KWON, SOONDONG
Los, Alamos, NM | Austin, TX | Austin, TX | Lemitar, NM | Kyungbuk, KR
BORKOWSKY, SAMUEL L. FREUND, SAMUEL M.
